price: Ó seguidores do Livro! Por que renegais os versículos de Allah, enquanto testemunhais que são verdadeiros?
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-antum tashhadūna
